Description: Removes all weapons and ammo from player. It's possible to also remove HEV suit.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Allows to change which players will be affected by player_weaponstrip.

keyChoices.choiceDescription: Strip only !activator of the script e.g. player who pressed a button that targeted this entity.
Strip everyone except the !activator of the script- e.g. strip everyone except player who pressed a button that targeted this entity.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it to remove player's weapons. Every trigger use-type works uniformly. Can be kill-targeted.
